tool_description: Fetches real-time shipment data from multiple carrier APIs including FedEx, UPS, USPS, DHL, and regional carriers.

carrier.description: Carrier name (fedex, ups, usps, dhl, amazon, ontrac)

include_history.description: Whether to include full tracking history

error_messages: API timeout: Increase api_timeout value or retry the request later.
Carrier API unavailable: The specified carrier's API is temporarily unavailable.
Authentication failed: Invalid API credentials for the specified carrier.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many API requests, wait before retrying.
Tracking number not found: The tracking number doesn't exist in the carrier's system.
Unsupported carrier: Use one of the supported carriers [fedex, ups, usps, dhl, amazon, ontrac].
usage: Provide tracking_number and carrier, optionally set api_timeout, include_history, and include_destination flags. The tool returns raw tracking data from the carrier's API.

raw_response.description: Raw JSON response from carrier API

last_updated.description: Timestamp when data was last updated by carrier
